00001 #include <iostream>
00002 using namespace std;
00003 #include <string>
00004 int main(){
00005         string tes = "3+5*8-10";
00006         string delimiter[10] = {"+","-","/","%",":"};
00007         size_t pos = 0;
00008         string token;
00009         for(int i = 0;i<=4;i++){
00010                 cout<<delimiter[i]<<endl;
00011         }
00012         int exit = 0;
00013         int counterdelimiter = 0;
00014         int countstillhavedelimiter = 5;
00015         while(countstillhavedelimiter!=0)
00016         {
00017                 if(countstillhavedelimiter != 0 && counterdelimiter ==5)
00018                 {
00019                         countstillhavedelimiter = 5;
00020                 }
00021                 if(counterdelimiter == 5)
00022                 {
00023                         counterdelimiter = 0;
00024                 }
00025                 
00026                 while((pos = tes.find(delimiter[counterdelimiter])) != std::string::npos) 
00027                 {
00028                         countstillhavedelimiter--;
00029                         token = tes.substr(0, pos);
00030                         std::cout << token << std::endl;
00031                         tes.erase(0, pos + delimiter[counterdelimiter].length());
00032                 }
00033                 counterdelimiter++;
00034                 std::cout << tes << std::endl;
00035                 
00036         }
00037 }
